title: Howard Bryant talks Aaron Rodgers, Scottie Pippen, Suns
description:
Bomani Jones and Howard Bryant discuss Packers QB Aaron Rodgers' series of interviews on the Pat McAfee show (5:10), Scottie Pippen’s continued grievance with former teammate and fellow Bulls Hall of Famer Michael Jordan (22:37) as well as what’s going on with the Suns (36:49).
